speaking.paragraph:
Madam President, I have advised the Senate leadership that I will be necessarily absent from -- (Senate - July 16, 2008)

[Page: S6863]

Madam President, I have advised the Senate leadership that I will be necessarily absent from the Senate for the balance of this week. Today, were I able to be present for the vote on final passage of S. 2731, the President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief, PEPFAR, I would have voted in favor of the bill.
